messages.message:
Hi Team,
I noticed that the *table field extraction* is configured as *list of objects*, but the extracted format differs from what we typically expect. This mismatch is causing issues:
• The comparison view becomes difficult to read and interpret.
• The *accuracy figures are unclear* because the list extraction format doesn’t align well with the ground truth table structure.
:hammer_and_wrench: *Details:*
• Config: `list of objects`
• Issue: Format inconsistency between extracted output (JSON list of objects) and ground truth table format.
• Impact: Accuracy analysis is misleading due to structural mismatch.
https://pg.aihub.instabase.com/hub/apps/8cb0b5a1-bafc-40ed-80de-e0f51e0ebbf9/accuracy/221
CC @Raushan Kumar Pandey @Swathy N @Nithin
unfortunately, we don't have a good way of configuring ground truth set comparisons for list-of-objects fields rn

after we finish https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-4600, we will remove the ability to set field types in ground truth set configurations

then in the future (ie future quarters), we can work on features like https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-3254 or similar capabilities for other field types

fyi @ayesha.ali @pauline.comising @Sherif
